name: video-editor-remotion
description: Remotion-based video editor for talking head + slides

scripts.proxy: bash -c 'for f in public/speaker.mp4 public/grid-loop.mp4; do out="${f%.mp4}-proxy.mp4"; [ -f "$out" ] && echo "Skip $out (exists)" || (echo "Creating $out..." && ffmpeg -i "$f" -vf scale=1280:720 -c:v libx264 -crf 28 -preset fast -g 30 -c:a aac -b:a 128k -movflags +faststart "$out" && echo "Done: $out"); done'
scripts.proxy:force: bash -c 'for f in public/speaker.mp4 public/grid-loop.mp4; do out="${f%.mp4}-proxy.mp4"; echo "Creating $out..." && ffmpeg -y -i "$f" -vf scale=1280:720 -c:v libx264 -crf 28 -preset fast -g 30 -c:a aac -b:a 128k -movflags +faststart "$out" && echo "Done: $out"; done'
